javax.microedition.lcdui

Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FullCanvas, GameCanvas

    public abstract class Canvas
extends View
    The Canvas class is an abstract class that extends View and implements View.OnTouchListener and View.OnKeyListener. It provides a framework for handling touch and key events, as well as drawing operations.
